content.description: Diagonal up and left to overhang, step left to slab past two bolts to anchor.
content.protection: Wires, small to medium cams, and one bolt lead to Bob's Route anchor.
content.location: Start on terrace between After Seven and Independence Day.

content.description: Perfect finger jams up and right and then back left to the anchor.  Bolt at the crux.
Thin crack follows left edge of slab.
content.protection: Wires, small to medium cams, and a bolt at the crux.
content.location: Left edge of slab at Jerry's Wall.

content.description:
Admin's NOTE: Apparently this is the same route as "Porno Bob's" route. R Hall 9/7/16

 Fun, enjoyable climb. Follow Dirty slanting cracks up the wall to a puzzling pull into an alcove (crux). THen head up and left to a bolt. Continue straight up to a two bolt anchor.
content.protection: Solid protection. Small to medium stoppers, and one bolt. A two bolt rappel anchor is at the top.
content.location: This route is located on a steep wall up to the right of the stream bed, fairly high on the left side of the cliff.

content.description: A really fun and interesting climb. Easy rock leads to a small roof. Pull through the roof and climb a series of cracks. An interesting mantle gets you to the top.
content.protection: 3 bolts to a two bolt chain anchor. A #2 Cam can be used to protect the easy rock before the first bolt.
content.location: The farthest route on the left, high up the stream bed.

content.description: Small wall with four climbs...some of the best cracks at Barrett's Cove.  Shady and breezy, close to the Verticals.
